block.p: BALTIMORE (AL) -- Signed Kevin Hickey, pitcher, to a one-year contract with Hagerstown of the Eastern League. Football
KANSAS CITY (AFC) -- Signed Steve Pelluer, quarterback, to a two-year contract.
PITTSBURGH (AFC) -- Signed Dan Stryzinski, punter. SACRAMENTO (WLAF) -- Waived Ben Bennett, quarterback. Signed Todd Ellis, quarterback, and assigned him to the practice squad. Colleges
KENTUCKY -- Named John Cropp tight-ends coach and administrative assistant.

MISSISSIPPI STATE -- Announced the resignation of Ron Polk, baseball coach, effective at the end of the season so he can take the position of executive director of the American Baseball Coaches Association.
NAZARETH -- Named Charles Salamone women's soccer coach.
TEXAS A&M -- Named Tony Barone men's basketball coach.
WASHINGTON STATE -- Signed Kelvin Sampson, men's basketball coach, to a seven-year contract extension.
BALTIMORE (AL) -- Signed Kevin Hickey, pitcher, to a one-year contract with Hagerstown of the Eastern League. Football
KANSAS CITY (AFC) -- Signed Steve Pelluer, quarterback, to a two-year contract.
PITTSBURGH (AFC) -- Signed Dan Stryzinski, punter. SACRAMENTO (WLAF) -- Waived Ben Bennett, quarterback. Signed Todd Ellis, quarterback, and assigned him to the practice squad. Colleges
KENTUCKY -- Named John Cropp tight-ends coach and administrative assistant.

MISSISSIPPI STATE -- Announced the resignation of Ron Polk, baseball coach, effective at the end of the season so he can take the position of executive director of the American Baseball Coaches Association.
NAZARETH -- Named Charles Salamone women's soccer coach.
TEXAS A&M -- Named Tony Barone men's basketball coach.
WASHINGTON STATE -- Signed Kelvin Sampson, men's basketball coach, to a seven-year contract extension.
